text: Tune in to @WBAI Thursday 12/24 at 5 p.m. when @JackHites and I talk #COVID19 #vaccine fairness with Denis @SlatteryNYDN of the Daily News and President Hazel Dukes of the @NYSNAACP. 99.5 FM and streaming everywhere via https://t.co/wemqivmPgX.
